name: Weld Art Challenges
description:
Welder Art: Good Weld Challenges is a colouring book for welders or anyone.

Simple choose a stencil, pick the colours and weld your masterpiece.

Colouring books have been proven to help people improve creativity, reduce ageing and enhance memory.

This is not only for tradies or welder, this can be a game for all ages from children to elderly

Be proud, be creative and start welding and colouring.

Please download and feedback if you are a w.e.l.d.e.r., boilermaker, pipefitter, NDT engineer, metal sheet worker, etc.

This pocket game should be good for anyone of any age, not just metal workers or engineer. It tests your patience and persistence. But also help welders, at least we believe so, to practice for welder test or even certified exam. Please let us know if it does.

HAVE FUN
